sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { api } from "../services/MockApiConfig" class Create extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { tite: "Your Title", image: "", ingredients: "", directions: "", errorMsg: "", } } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() const {title, image, ingredients, directions} = this.state const data = { title, image, ingredients, directions } api.post("/cocktails, data") .then((response) => response.status === 201 ? this.props.history.push("./cocktails") : null ) .catch(() => this.setState({errorMsg: "An error occured, please refresh."})) } render() { return (

Create Your Own Recipes

{this.state.title}

Image URL

Title

Ingredients

Directions



) } } export default Create
